port.description: The port of the recommendations server. (Recommendations only)

displayName.description: The localized display name of the application.

host.description: The host name of the recommendations host. (Recommendations only)

name.description: The non-localized name of the service, such as "Facebook" or "Recommendations".

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the merchant. (Recommendations only)

applicationId.description: The Facebook application ID of the merchant. (Facebook only)

id.description: The ID of the external application data. In the form "{serverType}-{applicationName}".
